Name Type Category PP Power Accuracy Description
Rock Throw 15 50 90 Throws small rocks to strike the foe.
Rock Slide 10 75 90 Large boulders are hurled. May cause flinching.
Sandstorm 10 0 Causes a sandstorm that rages for several turns.
Rollout 20 30 90 An attack lasting 5 turns with rising intensity.
Ancient Power 5 60 100 An attack that may raise all stats.
Rock Tomb 15 60 95 Stops the foe from moving with rocks and cuts Speed.
Rock Blast 10 25 90 Hurls boulders at the foe 2 to 5 times in a row.
Rock Polish 20 0 Polishes the body to sharply raise Speed.
Power Gem 20 80 100 Attacks with rays of light that sparkle like diamonds.
Rock Wrecker 5 150 90 Powerful, but leaves the user immobile the next turn.
Stone Edge 5 100 80 Stabs the foe with stones. High critical-hit ratio.
Stealth Rock 20 0 Sets floating stones that hurt a foe switching in.
Head Smash 5 150 80 A life-risking headbutt that seriously hurts the user.
Wide Guard 10 0 Evades wide-ranging attacks for one turn.
Smack Down 15 50 100 Throws a rock to knock the foe down to the ground.
Diamond Storm 5 100 95 Whips up a storm of diamonds. May up Defense.
Accelerock 20 40 100 Hits with a high-speed rock that always goes first.
Tar Shot 15 100 Lowers the foe's Speed and makes it weak to Fire.
Meteor Beam 10 120 90 A 2-turn move that raises Sp. Attack before attacking.
Orbit Blitz 5 85 95 A 56 km/s slam that decimates barriers at peak priority.
Mineral Mash 15 90 95 Kinetic powers crush the foe. It may paralyze.
Arid Terrain 10 0 Weaken Water, double Digger speed, block recoil.
Fractal Bash 10 0 100 Does more damage if the user outweighs the foe.
